title: 12/24/21  DPS Hour 2  Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting - Brandon Weeden
itunes:title: 12/24/21  DPS Hour 2  Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting - Brandon Weeden
description:
The Cleveland Browns are reportedly going to make a play for Deshaun Watson after the season. Doug and Jason give their thoughts on what that means for the Browns and for Baker Mayfield. Former Oklahoma State standout and NFL quarterback Brandon Weeden joins the Doug and Jason to talk about the state of college football, the relevance of the bowls, and to preview the college football playoff. The guys react to Iman Shumpert saying Lebron James ruined basketball by choosing to go to Miami and form a super team.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
